lead_paragraph: Athletic Director David Williams knows the Commodores need to do a better job of crowd control after fans stormed the court following an upset of Kentucky.

headline.print_headline: Vandy Fined $100,000 for Storming Court After Kentucky Game
headline.main: Vanderbilt Fined $100,000 After Fans Storm Court

snippet: Athletic Director David Williams knows the Commodores need to do a better job of crowd control after fans stormed the court following an upset of Kentucky....
